cbinstall.name: Private Messaging System (uddeIM PMS)
cbinstall.author: Stephan Slabihoud
cbinstall.description: v4.0 - Provides uddeIM integration for Community Builder. Also contains user deletion cleanup code.

param.name: doSingleEscape
param.label: Unescape '\\n'
param.description: When you have problems with '\\n' in notification messages set this to 'yes'. Default is 'no'.

param.name: doEscape
param.label: Double escape
param.description: When you have problems with '\n' in notification messages set this to 'no'. Default is 'yes'.

param.name: @spacer
param.default: also enable PMS integration in Configuration/Integration

param.name: showTitle
param.label: Show Tab title
param.description: Show the title of the tab inside this tab. The description is also shown, if present. IMPORTANT: The title is the tab title here.

param.name: showSubject
param.label: Show Subject Field
param.description: Show the subject field. If hidden, subject will be "Message from your profile view" = _UE_PM_PROFILEMSG
